website_summaries.verdict: This bag is built to withstand the worst Mother Nature has to offer, and it's backed by a lifetime guarantee.
pros: Can be used in temperatures as low as -22ºF
Long enough to accommodate users of all heights
cons: Some users wish the bag was a little shorter to trim down some of the unnecessary extra length and weight

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy and warm at 32F
customer_reviews.text: It has been tough for me to find a sleeping bag this wide. I hate being cramped and squished in them. But this one is roomy as heck. I'm 6ft 0in and 230lbs and I love this thing. It's a bit bulky for someone hiking and sticking this in your pack though. But luckily I have a 70 liter pack that it fits in a little snug. Would of loved to of gotten it into the sleeping bag compartment, but that just wasn't going to happen. I know a lot of people would pass this up for something lighter and smaller, but to me this is my luxury item that I must have.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Backpacking hammock style
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this backpack for backpacking in Wyoming and Montana. Some people are shy about its weight for what I was using it for. It kept me warm with frosty nights. It packs nice back in its compress sack. Deffinately worth the weight for comfort and safety! Deffinately recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Just used it while hiking in Montana ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Just used it while hiking in Montana under very harsh conditions; rain, snow, 15 degree temp. and 60mph gusts. 4 nights endin 10/30/2016. Warm and dry. Love the head cover. Friends made a little fun with me about its weight in my pack but well worth it at 10,000 feet. Andy,
customer_reviews.author: Andy, Raleigh, NC

customer_reviews.title: Winter camper.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this sleeping bag, as a winter camper, it can get very cold at night. This sleeping bag keeps you warm and cozy. I have to say the lowest temperature i have used it is 29°F.
customer_reviews.author: sparrington

customer_reviews.title: Stayed warm at 14 degrees F...
customer_reviews.text: Warm sleeping bag. Tent camped in sub-freezing temperatures (14 degrees F.) for a weekend with the scouts. I used this bag in conjunction with a ground pad (Lightspeed Outdoors Warmth Series Self Inflating Sleep Camp Pad) and foil insulation under the pad (the foil / shipping air bubble insulation from a home improvement store). Our water bottles froze inside the tent, but we did not!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene C St. Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Brutally honest
customer_reviews.text: It was cold one night this fall so I crept in wearing only boxers and woke up sweating. Yeah... worth the hype
customer_reviews.author: Hansariff Con

customer_reviews.title: good winter bag
customer_reviews.text: was a gift for my son. he has used it in sub-freezing temps on camping trips and says it keeps him very warm. the only issue he has with it is that it is difficult to get back in the stuff sack. I will say that I did it as well and it isn't the easiest one I've done.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Fine for novice camping - too heavy for backpacking
customer_reviews.text: The product is warm and comfortable, however, I would not recommend sleeping in a hammock with this below 50 degrees F - it's just not insulated enough for that. Also, it is VERY heavy and bulky to carry (but that is as advertised). I won't be bringing this on any other hiking trips. All-in-all, it's a solid and warm sleeping bag, but not very mobile or versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Jay C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a cold night
customer_reviews.text: It was cold one night, forgot to turn on the heat and this was all I had. It took less than 10 minutes for me to feel warm all over. I used it as a sleeping bag that night and what a Lifesaver. Dont recall being ever that warm from a sleeping bag ever. Needs a detatchable pillow other than that fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous2

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm in 30f weather so you can sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Kept Dtr warm in 30F Colorado Unheated cabin. Tried many- this is best for price and quality. All other children were Too cold to sleep. Dtr likes cushy head part- she says she doesn't need pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I keep warm down to 30°F this bag is soft and large I dont even know I am in the bag. I recommend this bag, I am going to buy another one very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amabuyingstuff Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toasty
customer_reviews.text: This definitely keeps you warm. It is also really comfy. Used outside in the winter a few times and couldn’t fee any chill whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Kuri

customer_reviews.title: Great Size for a Hammock
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag Friday morning and slept in it Saturday night during an over night hammock camp. I put a foam sleeping pad down in my hammock with this sleeping bag on top. Surprisingly it didn’t not slide down or twist up. I slept in 38-41 degree F in my underwear! This bag is great! I will test in out in colder temperatures as the seasons change.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great sleeping bag. Used in Tibet, in the mountains. Provides serious warmth and keeps you dry as well.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: ... wish it compacted a little more but does a great job keeping you warm
customer_reviews.text: I wish it compacted a little more but does a great job keeping you warm. Update: Stuff sack tore the first time that I used it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Uecker

customer_reviews.title: Warm and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This bag was amazing. I don't like the confinement of a mommy bag and this was the perfect alternative. Kept me extremely warn and I still has room to move. Would recommend to anyone looking for a great 2-3 season bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Robison

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after only using it twice
customer_reviews.text: Had it for less than a year and the zipper broke. Tried calling Earthmarth the manufacturer and no one has returned my call. Very disappointed. Only used it twice.
customer_reviews.author: wiglover

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and warm and comfy. I went winter camping twice with it, and I am pretty satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.author: Seong

customer_reviews.title: It's WARM and BIG!!!
customer_reviews.text: I want to start off with - I took one star away for only one reason - it's BIG and Amazon doesn't do half stars.. It's warm, it's a great sleeping bag. But when you go to try to put into the sleeping bag compartment of our 70L backpack, it's doesn't fit. The compression bag does a good job, but just not small enough. We live in the Rocky Mountains and this sleeping bag is the "bag of choice" during the dreaded 4th season.
customer_reviews.author: R U A DAD?

customer_reviews.title: Great product for winter camping
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is WARM AS HELL! Exactly what I was looking for. I used it in northern Michigan in early March (still very much winter, 4 degrees above 0 at night), and I was toasty as could be. Great product for winter camping, but you might cook over the summer, so be prepared to unzip!
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for hunting at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Used the bag for a elk trip in Colorado. Most nights were in the mid 20’s Fahrenheit and one night in the low teens. I am pleased to say that I stayed very comfortable in this sleeping bag. If there is a down side, the zipper is not real smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: He said it is perfect for winter Boy Scout camp
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 14 year old grandson. He said it is perfect for winter Boy Scout camp.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: It is like the material instantly heats to your body temp
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not made to zip with another bag to make bedding for two people, but was still very warm with just towing one on top of the other... it is soft and there are no cold spots. It is like the material instantly heats to your body temp . Awesome bags!
customer_reviews.author: angela near

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleeping bag, needs better storage bag
customer_reviews.text: Warm in weather the bag is designed for, water resistant, noisey but stuffs back into bag easily. The stitching on the storage bag is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha-Jo A.

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this many times over 16 months. It keeps me very warm and comfortable. I've recommended it to many.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the searcher on the cold trail
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with down inside at such a low price. I'm not sure how easy it will be to unzip to cool feet but should be great feature, wish they had a choice of a shorter bag, don't like carrying around waste
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and cozy. Something perfect for cold outdoor weather.
customer_reviews.author: Nolatare

customer_reviews.title: WARM and COZY
customer_reviews.text: We camped at -8F and I was warm all night with just my long underwear on. The bag is small and compact but offers great warmth. I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: frank mihalek

customer_reviews.title: but it was nice and toasty
customer_reviews.text: Stays really warm. I've only slept in it down to 30F, but it was nice and toasty. Above 45F-50F it gets too warm, but when it is cooler it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Got me through a full winter. Very warm, ...
customer_reviews.text: Got me through a full winter. Very warm, very waterproof. Got mildewy in storage but I was able to wash and reuse.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Awalt-Conley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great length for tall people and super warm for cold weather sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a February trip up Haines Hwy in Alaska. Got stuck in the pass and got to use it for a few hours. Works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We are avid campers, my son did not stay warm when it dropped below 5 degrees over night. First time we used it. Luckily I had another bag for him, but not happy with this purchase. Would not recommend. The price probably gave it away oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Miemczewski

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional!!! Performs as advertised. Very warm on the coldest nights. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great bag and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Really great bag and customer service. My Cattle dog had the first one for a snack, so I bought another right away. Used in 20 degree yurt and was comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Really is waterproof. I went kayaking and did not get wet. Also I was fishing and laid the fish on the sleeping bag. Never got wet. It is also extremely warm. Really happy. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: zach hyatt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very warm no problems sleeping in 30 degrees and less
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely warm but heavier than I thought. But I'll put up with weight to stay warm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is not as warm as the review says it to be. I gave it to my dog. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome sleeping bag. Really keeps you warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Quintessential Acquisitionist

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The first sleeping bag I've had that actually is warm but not uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Brad Kniffin

customer_reviews.title: great bags. we camped with heavy rain & some ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 based on the reviews and they weren't wrong! great bags. we camped with heavy rain & some water got in our tent but the bags stayed dry. temps got into the mid 20's but we were fine! for the price, you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: the real mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Used it backpacking. Very warm, almost too warm to use in 50+ temps. But it packs down nice and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag for a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag for a fantastic price! Bought two of these wonderful bags so that me and my girl can zip them together and cuddle in the wilderness! Thanks Emarth for a light and effective sleep system!
customer_reviews.author: James Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing! Perfect quality! I recommend this to other people.
customer_reviews.author: Rupinder Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed! The zipper does catch at times so one ...
customer_reviews.text: Reason I bought this was to keep warm in the cold weather in Colorado. Well, camping in RMNP it didn't keep me warm at 40 degrees at night. Very disappointed! The zipper does catch at times so one has to go slow in zipping it. I like the color, the style, but doesn't keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Very warm. Kept my 14 yr old snug in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very warm. Kept my 14 yr old snug in 26 degree weather. Not hyper light.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: It's toasty warm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. In the cold northeast a puffy down bag is just what the doctor order for winter camping. Well made, carefully stitched.
customer_reviews.author: Russell J. Peppe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised. It's really for extreme cold-weather. ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. It's really for extreme cold-weather. It was almost a little too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Alaine P.

customer_reviews.title: nice and warm in chilly morning around 50 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to try it out in cold weather. Had to fight with the zipper, more than expected. Other than that, nice and warm in chilly morning around 50 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: SW Mainer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: With just 2 uses, the zipper came off the track. It was extremely difficult to get it back on. Don't think the quality is worth what I paid for this.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda H

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for spring baseball games and football games in Northern Missouri. Used it for the first time last night. The weather was COLD, windy and damp. I couldn't be more happy with this purchase! Usually with normal bags and blankets I'm still freezing at the end of the game. Not last night! I was cozy warm and very thankful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: This sleeping bag is amazing! I haven't used it in colder weathet yet
customer_reviews.text: This sleeping bag is amazing! I haven't used it in colder weathet yet, but so far ot has kept me warm every night i have used it.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely warm, 5 stars for that, ...
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely warm, 5 stars for that, but It is not roomy enough for my personal comfort. And I cannot open it flat to use as a throw blanket which also is a negative for me.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Barquero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband was excited to get this sleeping bag for hunting trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice bag
customer_reviews.text: pretty nice bag , I sat out on deck in it drinking beer and felt warm at 8 deg .F
customer_reviews.author: Keith James

customer_reviews.title: 2 weird zippers make this bag usless to me
customer_reviews.text: There is 2 zippers. Not just 1 zipper like most normal sleeping bags. 1 zipper is just for the bottom edge and about 1.5 feet up for your feet to be trapped in. The other zipper goes from about 1.5 feet from the bottom where the other zipper ends, and then extends to the top. Why this bag has this is beyond me. You can not open the bag up like a blanket. I guess some people like this zipper configuration? I would love this bag if it had 1 normal zipper....
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Ward

product_meta.title: Emarth Winter Cold Weather Sleeping Bag(-22 F ~ 41 F), Large Waterproof Comfort Sleeping Bags with Compression Sack for Camping, Hiking, Traveling, Backpacking, Outdoor Activities-(Single)
product_meta.description:
Emarth cold weather sleeping bag is the perfect sleeping bag for the cold weather outdoors enthusiast who wants less to carry while hiking and backpacking, but still wants a warm and comfy place to crash at night. This waterproof sleeping bag will let you sleep comfortably even when it's only 0F outside. The outdoor sleeping bag can be compressed to sall volume(20 x 10 in), which makes it easy to carry and space-saving. It is extremely durable and designed to withstand the elements during outdoor use and also makes an excellent gift for those outdoor enthusiasts in your life. 

Features: 
■Sturdy snag-free, two-way zippers with metal pulls. 
■Comfortable cuff surrounds your face with softness. 
■Fiber lock prevents insulation from shifting, double-layer construction, increase warmth and durability.
■Space-saving, portable, can be compressed to small volume (20 x 10 in) and a carry sack is included. 
■Oversized sleeping bag designed to fit one person comfortably. 

Specification: 
●Dimension: 90(83+7.9) x 35 in 
●Weight: 5.9 lbs/2.7kg
●Package dimension: 20 x 10 in 
●Fabric: nylon ripstop 
●Liner: polyester 
●Filled: eiderdown 
●Comfortable temperature: 20-40F 
●Lowest temperature: -22F 
●Recommended Use: Outdoor, Camping, Indoor, Cold-Weather Camping

What's in the package: 
●1x Sleeping Bag 
●1x Carry Sack
feature_bullets: 【Winter Sleeping Bag】Stay cozy even on the coldest nights of your camping or hiking trips with the Winter Sleeping Bag. The shell of sleeping bag is made with 320T nylon ripstop and the lining filled with 100g/㎡ polyester whcih is skin-friendly. This cold weather sleeping bags is made with puffy double-layer construction with 4.1 pounds of eiderdown fill that traps plenty of air for extra warmth

【Perfect for Cold Weather】Sleep comfortable, even when it's 0F outside. The 0 degree sleeping bags is lined with high quality material to ensure it can handle a temperature of -22 to 41 degrees Fahrenheit with ease. It meaning can keep the average sleeper warm even at 20F. The large sleeping bag is 90" long and 35" wide in order to accommodate people of all different sizes, perfect for adults

【Advanced Design and Construction】Two-way No Snag zipper plows fabric away from the zipper to prevent snags. There's even a zipper near the foot that creates ventilation on warmer nights. The semi-sculpted adjustable, drawstring hood surrounds your head and locks in heat, down-filled draft collar with easy-access drawcord helps to trap body heat inside, your experience easy and hassle free
【 Easy to Transport and Clean】This travel sleeping bag folds easily comes with a compression stuff sack to storage and carry. The sleeping bag is machine washable for easy cleaning at home

【Reliable and Friendly Customer Service】Reliable and friendly customer service within a 24 hour time frame. Lifetime hassle-free money back guarantee, Lifetime warranty, If you are not satisfied with the quality of the big sleeping bag, we will fully-refund you. No questions asked
